sentences.en: After the operation you may find it difficult to chew and swallow.
sentences.cn: 手术后你咀嚼和吞咽都会感到困难。

sentences.en: Chew your food well before you swallow it.
sentences.cn: 食物在吞咽前要仔细咀嚼.

sentences.en: During the 1980s monster publishing houses started to swallow up smaller companies.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代，一些出版巨头开始吞并一些较小的公司。

sentences.en: He downed his whisky in one swallow.
sentences.cn: 他一口喝下威士忌。

sentences.en: He swallowed the last of his coffee and asked for the bill.
sentences.cn: 他喝完最后一口咖啡，要求结账。

sentences.en: I don't know how I managed to swallow my anger.
sentences.cn: 我不知道怎样才能抑制住我的愤怒.

sentences.en: I don't want any ifs and buts — swallow your medicine at once.
sentences.cn: 我不要听你的理由,快把药吞下去.

sentences.en: I don't want ifs and buts; swallow your medicine at once.
sentences.cn: 我可不听你泡蘑菇, 马上吞下你的药.

sentences.en: I found his story a bit hard to swallow (= difficult to believe ) .
sentences.cn: 我觉得他的说法有点叫人难以置信。

sentences.en: I found it hard to swallow his insults.
sentences.cn: 我真的很难忍受他的侮辱.

sentences.en: I too found this story a little hard to swallow.
sentences.cn: 我也觉得这件事有点难以置信。

sentences.en: Jan lifted her glass and took a quick swallow.
sentences.cn: 简拿起玻璃杯猛地喝了一口。

sentences.en: Most snakes swallow their prey whole .
sentences.cn: 大多数蛇都是把猎物囫囵吞下。

sentences.en: One swallow does not make a summer.
sentences.cn: 一燕不成夏.

sentences.en: Polly took a bite of the apple, chewed, and swallowed.
sentences.cn: 波莉咬了一口那个苹果，嚼了嚼吞了下去。

sentences.en: She swallowed nervously before beginning.
sentences.cn: 开始之前她紧张地咽了一下口水。

sentences.en: Sometimes he regurgitates the food we give him because he cannot swallow.
sentences.cn: 有时他会倒嚼我们喂给他吃的食物，因为他无法吞咽。

sentences.en: Strain at a gnat and swallow a camel.
sentences.cn: 小事拘谨,大事糊涂.

sentences.en: The swallow dashed [ shot ] through the air.
sentences.cn: 燕子躜天儿.

sentences.en: The swallow shaved the top of a tree.
sentences.cn: 燕子擦着树梢飞过.

sentences.en: You are asked to swallow a capsule containing vitamin B.
sentences.cn: 你要服一粒维生素B胶囊。
